title: "Your Shop" not loading
body:
My shop is at a never ending loading screen. :(

https://prnt.sc/f9gsnk

replies.body: Im having the same problem
Common RIOT sort your chit out and let me spend my money !
Damn you RIOT I want to spend my money
Same I just got home and i have 10 bucks to waste.. Cmon Riot get ur sh!t together!!
mines not working and I'm about to kms real quick doge
same problem with me, seems to be a trend. riot will catch word and fix it
same here
Mines not working either..man
Been trying to load for 5 minutes. Stil staring at a blue rotating circle. Some of my friend's "Your Shop" works fine. :({{item:3070}}
Same, homies we gotta stay strong
same probo here {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

> [{quoted}](name=H1ghV0ltag3,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=uHMy7nR8,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2017-05-18T23:07:08.074+0000)
>
> same probo here {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

okay so now I got in but the individuals skins won't open up

I have a fix! Just restart your computer and reopen league again. I had the same problem but after i restarted my computer it worked. Hope you find this helpful! :D{{champion:17}} If "Your Shop" isn't there at all, close the game and check to make sure you have the latest version, if u do then just restart the game.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

sorry but .. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bG0kTf5Xcrw xD
(just kidding)
xDD

We're working on getting Your Shop loading correctly again, but in the meantime we can try refreshing the client and looking over your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to see if we can get those offers loading.

Issue is solved now, but I was wondering: what does "refreshing the client" mean? To close it and launch it again, or can we, I don't know, press F5 or something, and the client refreshes its content?
It is loading for me now. :) Thank you!
does it work for you now ?

Same. I revealed the skins i could get and one of them was project lucian so i was like fuck yeah, went to get some rp and now i cant load it again to buy the skin :(

Pls riot
Lol same thing here but with sandstorm ekko. It eventually worked after 2 hours but i still have 1 slot that wont load
I was excited to see what skins I have in "Your Shop". The spinning circle is killing my buzz man...
Same. I tried to log in on my SO's mac instead of my PC and it still did not work :(
Yep hopefully this gets fixed soon ripperoni

My wallet lives to die another day.
https://gyazo.com/c34254fcf19dcc975c4245ef9e100d74

Dang.
No bueno {{item:3073}}
Mine also is failing to load. http://prntscr.com/f9h9p7 {{champion:163}}
Riot going to fix this anytime soon?
I had a brief window that it loaded and I got dragonblade riven IDK if I'll get that deal still Q_Q
Sucks to see that happening to you guys but somehow happy to see im not the only one with that problem. I was starting to think my computer was the problem
same
same problem :(
Im having the same problem too

Seems to be a common problem, both my SO and me have the same issue.
I´m gonna try to log out for a little longer and see if that fixes the problem, who knows.
Man I was so excited for it for some reason; guess I just gotta wait a little longer.
